posts.postText:
http://cloud.steampowered.com/ugc/559783872454725584/6FDDBEC7E91CC514AE75D1E3CC9E362C72474BE0/ 

I have just coded all of this myself, so we can have an administration mod compatible with sourcebans.

Will be on the servers in a few days.

>> Is sourcemod not enough? 
This will be replacing ULX, sourcemod isn't needed.

Will there be new commands to learn? or like different commands (!slay, !kick, !ban and such?? different?? or same??)

Will I have the power to burn people??

What about slap?
Also, i'd like the answer to Flame's question too. Not about igniting (Not necessary IMO) but the commands.

>> Will you release it ? <3 

You joined or forums just to figure this out? -_-

He probably won't.

>> >> Will you release it ? <3 
You joined or forums just to figure this out? -_-
 
No, not really.

>> But I like ULX... 
I do too, but personally, i think this is much simpler and better in the long run. It just needs other important commands.
